Package gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.labels

Labeling support of hierarchies (that make ancestry queries possible in O(1) time).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Hierarchy  
Labeler A strategy to assign labels to a hierarchy.
Labeler.TreeBuilder  
LabelManager A manager of labeling structures, which has the responsibility of providing labeling services to a Model.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHierarchy Template implementation of Hierarchy.
CompoundInterval A collection of simple intervals.
Interval An interval defines a continuous, closed segment of integers.
Label A label, consisting of a tree label (which is a simple Interval), and direct and indirect propagated labels (CompoundInterval both).
Labelers  
LabelManagers A collection of LabelManager implementations.
LabelManagers.NonIncrementalMainMemoryManager A non-incremental LabelManager that invalidates its labels upon any model modification.
MainMemoryHierarchy A main-memory implementation of Hierarchy.
PredefinedLabels An entity that defines predefined labels for particular Resources.
 

Package gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.labels Description

Labeling support of hierarchies (that make ancestry queries possible in O(1) time). Meant only for internal usage, so any javadocs are very light if existent at all.

Author:
Andreou Dimitris, email: jim.andreou (at) gmail (dot) com
